original_title: Live Concert from the Semper Opera, Dresden
overview: Filmed live in 1998 at Dresden's Semper Opera, legendary conductor Giuseppe Sinopoli leads the renowned SÃ¤chsische Staatskapelle Dresden in this superb concert celebrating their 450th anniversary. Selections include Vivaldi's "Concerto per l'Orchestra di Dresda" in G Minor; Carl Maria von Weber's "Jubel" Overture, op. 59; Wagner's Overture to "Rienzi"; and Strauss's "An Alpine Symphony," op. 64.
title: Live Concert from the Semper Opera, Dresden
